headline.main: INTERESTING FROM NEW-GRANADA.; Great preparations in Costa Rica for Prosecuting the War. News from the South Pacific and West Indies. Opinions of the Isthmus Press on its Occupation by the United States. The Diplomatic Rupture with England.

docs.lead_paragraph: By the arrival at this port of the steamship Illinois, we receive interesting news from NewGranada. In relation to the pending difficulty between Great Britain and New-Granada, the Aspinwall Courier of Nov. 1 says:
docs.abstract: Preparations in Costa Rica for prosecuting War
docs.snippet: By the arrival at this port of the steamship Illinois, we receive interesting news from NewGranada. In relation to the pending difficulty between Great Britain and New-Granada, the Aspinwall Courier of Nov. 1 says:

headline.main: LATEST INTELLIGENCE.; Arrival of Members--The President's Message--Whitfield's Seat to be Contested--The Central American Question, &c. FROM WASHINGTON. By Telegraph to the New-York Daily Times. Magnetic Telegraph Co.'s Offices--4 Henover-st., and 181 Broadway. House Printing Telegraph--Office No. 21 Wall-street.

docs.lead_paragraph: Members are coming in very rapidly, and there is no doubt of a quorum in both Houses to-morrow morning. An unusually large number have already arrived. Every New-England Republican is here except DAMRELI, of Massachusetts, who is detained by sickness. BURLINGAME is suffering yet by weakness from his recent illness, but he is here.

headline.main: IMPORTANT FROM CALIFORNIA.; News from Oregon and the Sandwich Islands. Great Chinese Battle near Stockton. $1,830,220 IN TREASURE. REVOLUTION IN SONORA. The Markets. CALIFORNIA MARRIAGES AND DEATHS. Buchanan's Plurality Six Thousand. ARRIVAL OF THE ILLINOIS. The Vigilance Committee Triumphant in the City and County. RESULTS OF THE ELECTIONS. Fierce Attacks on P. T. Herbert. NO SERIOUS DISTURBANCE AT THE POLLS.

docs.lead_paragraph: The United States mail steamship Illinois, Capt. C. S. BOUGS, U. S. N., Commander, left Aspinwall at 2:45 P. M. on the 2Oth, and arrived at Quarantine at 8 1/2 o'clock A. M. on Saturday, the 29th November. She brings the California malls of the 5th inst., two weeks later, 364 passengers and $1,830,220 in treasure on freight.
docs.abstract: His address to the people of Cal.
